text: All the officials of the king of Babylon came in and took over the city, making their headquarters at the Middle Gate. They were Nergal-sharezer of Samgar, Nebo-sarsekim the Rabsaris, Nergal-sharezer the Rabmag,39:3. “Rabsaris” and “Rabmag” are functions that are not clear. However, the clearly refer to high royal officials. and all the other officials of the king of Babylon.
